Reviews.Title: good camera, clear pics,, worth the investment
Reviews.Author: Sandra
Reviews.Content: So far it has been working as expected, clear pic, wish it had come with the audio installed  for communicating via web. Definitely would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Don't get this for a gift.
Reviews.Author: Doug Baughman
Reviews.Content: The plug and play hasn't worked and so far hard wiring a direct connection isn't working either. It's made a poor gift.

ProductInfo.Features:
1920 x 1080 (1080p HD) Wireless N Outdoor IP Camera with Dedicated Free plug and view apps on iPhone, iPad, Galaxy 4/4s, HTC Android OS smartphone, Kindle Fire HD Android OS tablets and more.
Built-in MicroSD card DVR expandable to 128Gb & Multi-zone Motion Sensor; Infrared Night Vision to 15 metres
With huge data transfer , around 6-7Mbps, camera wireless signal strength range in 30 feet with one plaster wall block. For longer or stronger wireless singal strength range , replacement of 5dBi to 9dBi camera antenna or consumer grade to enterprise-level router.
Motion Triggered Recordings and Alerts by email or uploaded to FTP
Facial and car license plate recognition in 45 feet with Wide Viewing angle:  Horizontal: 60°, Vertical: 40°
ProductInfo.Name: TriVision NC-336W HD 1080P Home IP Security Camera Outdoor, Wireless N, 100% IP66-Rated Waterproof, Infrared Night Vision, Motion Detectio Triggered Email Alert, MicroSD Card DVR Expandable to Max 128Gb, Total in 3 Steps with Our Free Plug and View iPhone, iPad, Android Smart Phone & Kindle Fire HD apps and more
